messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Life Learning Magazine
messages.msgSnippet: ... OR.... You could get a subscription to the new _Connections: ezine of unschooling and mindful parenting_ that costs only $10 and comes across in a
messages.messageBody:
Homeschlfor2@... wrote:

> I hope this is ok to post something like this! I just had this great idea
> if its workable. We got some sample copies of Life Learning Magazine at a
> conference back in March. I LOVE IT but its just not in the budget
> right now.
> I was thinking if someone else got it and wanted to share some of the
> cost
> and then send it on to me. It was so Inspiring to have that hard copy to
> share with family and read before going to bed! Thought id give it a
> shot!
>










OR....


You could get a subscription to the new _Connections: ezine of
unschooling and mindful parenting_ that costs only $10 and comes across
in a convenient online venue, featuring the writing of Ren Allen, Kelly
Lovejoy, and Deb Lewis--all regular posters here--as well as Sandra
Dodd, Rue Kream, Anne Ohman and more!

http://connections.organiclearning.org

--
~~Danielle
Emily (8), Julia (7), Sam (6)
http://www.organiclearning.blogspot.com

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*

Connections: ezine of unschooling and mindful parenting
http://connections.organiclearning.org

messages.subject: [unschoolingbasics] Life Learning Magazine
messages.msgSnippet: I hope this is ok to post something like this!  I just had this great  idea if its workable.   We got some sample copies of Life Learning  Magazine at a
messages.messageBody:
I hope this is ok to post something like this! I just had this great idea
if its workable. We got some sample copies of Life Learning Magazine at a
conference back in March. I LOVE IT but its just not in the budget right now.
I was thinking if someone else got it and wanted to share some of the cost
and then send it on to me. It was so Inspiring to have that hard copy to
share with family and read before going to bed! Thought id give it a shot!
Thanks

Chrissy in IL


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
